description: The tender involves the purchase of promotional items, including pens, keychains, lanyards, popockets, stress relievers, tote bags, and a variety of other items. full_summary:
### Communication Promotional Material Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** PW-CY-011-81404

**Publication Date:** September 27, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** October 12, 2022 (2:00 PM EDT)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Category:** SRV

**Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Background
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Communication Promotional Material. This procurement is based on the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Scope of Work
The Department of National Defence requires the following promotional items:

| Item Number | Description | Quantity |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Liquid Gel Blue Ink Pen, 0.7mm ball | 18,000 |
| 2 | Carabiner Key Chain | 18,000 |
| 3 | Ribbed Polyester Lanyards 36" x ¾" | 15,000 |
| 4 | Popsockets | 4,000 |
| 5 | Sub Marine Stress Reliever | 7,500 |
| ... | ... | ... |
| 27 | Waist Bag | 2,600 |

## Delivery Requirements
Suppliers must deliver all Initial items and their associated quantities to the final destinations no later than March 22, 2022. The Crown reserves the right to increase or decrease the quantities of the items for budgetary reasons.

## Qualification Requirements
To be eligible, suppliers must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement EN578-191297 for the supply of Promotional Items with Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Submission Requirements
Proposals must be submitted in either one of Canada's official languages. Documents may be submitted in electronic format.

## Contact Information
For any inquiry, please contact Maxine Holloway at maxine.holloway@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca or (613) 967-7248.

### End of Document
